programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Left for Dead / On the Case (#126)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E25, A detective in California tracks down a prostitute's killer with the help of a key piece of evidence. And two persistent cold case detectives use DNA to investigate the 1990 murder of a woman and the death of a man killed in a car crash in 1988.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E07, We follow Det. Vince Velazquez of Atlanta and Capt. Russell Popham of East Point, Ga., as they work to solve the 1995 rape and murder of 14-year-old Nacole Smith, one of Atlanta's most notorious unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Jungle Goddess
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Jungle Goddess, S02E03, An heiress stranded in Africa is made queen of the jungle in the feature film and Bela Lugosi stars in the short The Phantom Creeps. Joel and the Bots create their own infomercial.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 2: The Undersea City
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E15, The second installment of the undersea adventure to Atlantis.

programme.title: Wild Rebels
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Wild Rebels, S03E07, A retired race car driver, talked into going undercover by the police, joins a biker gang and must serve as the getaway car driver.

programme.title: Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Unchained, S04E08, While trying to resolve a quarrel between warring brothers Eteocles and Polynices, Hercules is taken captive by Queen Omphale of Lydia.

programme.title: Moon Zero Two
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Moon Zero Two, S01E11, The crew stages their own moon landing pageant as they watch the film Moon Zero Two about an astronaut hired to capture an asteroid made of sapphires.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Radar Men From The Moon - Chapter 1: Moon Rocket
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E01, The first episode of the 1952 serial featuring Commander Cody's trip to the moon.

programme.title: The Pumaman
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E03, A man learns he was born with special powers and becomes the superhero Puma Man. He fights the villainous Dr. Kobras, who uses an ancient mind-control mask in his attempts to rule the world.

MST3K: The Robot vs. The Aztec Mummy, 19891118000000 +0000, Scientists search for the ancient breastplate of a mummy, culminating in a mad scientist's attempt to fight the creature through the construction of a robot.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 1)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E17, The first part of this essential guide to modern car sales techniques.
MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron, 19910907000000 +0000, It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.

MST3K: I Accuse My Parents, 19930904000000 +0000, A young man gets mixed up with a crime syndicate and blames his inattentive parents. The 1940s-era documentary short explains the then-new techniques that enabled farmers to rush produce to market.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Mick receives damaging information about Thomas.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Mark offers Trace and his band a worldwide tour deal.

A Ring by Spring, 20140308000000 +0000, A fiercely independent single woman is forced to consider marrying her not-so-perfect boyfriend when a gypsy fortuneteller convinces her she must be engaged by the spring or risk a lifetime alone.

A Smile as Big as the Moon, 20120129000000 +0000, A special-education teacher is determined to make sure his students get a chance to attend space camp. Overcoming unbelievable odds, he achieves amazing results. Stars John Corbett and Jessy Schram.
Summer in the City, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A midwestern girl tries to adopt a big city personality with disastrous results.
Meddling Mom, 20120203000000 +0000, A woman (Sonia Braga) urges her oldest daughter (Ana Ayora) to have a baby, while trying to play matchmaker for her youngest (Mercedes Renard).

Midnight Masquerade, 20140927000000 +0000, A young woman's life takes a turn when she inherits a billion-dollar company. On Halloween night, she shares a dance with a mysterious "prince" at a costume ball and yearns for the love and romance her life has been missing.

The Mystery Cruise, 20131005000000 +0000, Alvirah, Regan, and their husbands join a murder mystery cruise. But, when Alvirah sees a real murder attempt, she and Regan must find a way to keep the intended victim safe while trying to find proof to expose the murderer.

My Gal Sunday, 20140125000000 +0000, A newlywed couple must prove their crime-solving prowess when their politically-tied parents are taken hostage by a vengeful kidnapper looking for justice for the wrongful murder conviction of his brother.

programme.title: Revelations
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E22, Still dealing with the death of one of their own, SG-1 must put its mourning aside in order to confront the warlord Anubiswho has captured the Asgard leader Thor so he can extract the secrets of their ancient technology for universal domination.

programme.title: Redemption (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E01, The SG-1 team faces two potential disasters light years apart as an energy build-up in the Stargate threatens to destroy Earth, and Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns home to find his wife dead, his son estranged and his planet under attack.

programme.title: Redemption (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E02, As Teal'c and his son battle to save Earth, O'Neill pilots the X-3, a newly designed interstellar spacecraft that will carry the Stargate far away from Earth so it can explode harmlessly in deep space. But how will SG-1 operate without the Stargate?

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E03, The SG-1 team investigates an abandoned Goa'uld ship orbiting the Earth. While they try to salvage the ship, saboteurs attack and the vessel plummets to Earth, deep into the ocean, with O'Neill and his crew trapped insideand time running out.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E04, An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Nightwalkers
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E05, When a scientist working on stem cell research disappears, Carter, Teal'c and Quinn investigate and discover that the scientist's town is infested with Goa'uld who can only control the citizens by night. Will Carter, Teal'c and Quinn be taken over?

programme.title: Misbegotten
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E02, Successfully using the retrovirus to turn an entire hive ship of Wraith into humans the team returns to Atlantis with their prisoners in stasis. Weir continues to defend her leadership in the face of an independent review being conducted by the IOA.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E03, The team comes across a small village with a revered leader. Beckett soon becomes so enamored by his host he brings him to Atlantis. But soon, McKay discovers that Lucius is using some sort of pheromone to enchant those around him.

programme.title: Sateda
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E04, Exploring a village, the team is suddenly attacked and taken prisoner as Ronon had unknowingly lured the Wraith there. The villagers set Sheppard and Teyla free, who mobilize a strike force. When they return, the village has been devastated.

programme.title: Progeny
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E05, Dr. McKay discovers a reference to an abandoned Ancient testing site. At the site, the team discovers a vast metropolis supporting millions of Ancients. Eager to create an alliance, Weir is shocked when their leader Oberoth refuses the offer.

programme.title: The Real World
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E06, Waking up in a psychiatric hospital outside of D.C., Weir is shocked to discover that her entire experience in Atlantis over the last two years was all in her imagination. She learns that a car accident left her suffering from delusional psychosis.

programme.title: Common Ground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E07, Summoned to a planet by a communication code, the team is ambushed by Kolya, who has now created his own faction of Genii after being forced from the inner circle. While the rest of the team manages to escape, Sheppard is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Mckay And Mrs. Miller
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E08, McKay is called back to earth to convince his estranged sister, Jeannie Miller, to assist the Air Force. McKay and Jeannie travel to Atlantis and begin the experiment which is initially successful until a McKay from the parallel universe appears.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E09, Major Leonard's team fails to check in with Atlantis while on a mission. Following the energy readings in hope of finding Major Leonard and his men, McKay leads the team into a cave to discover that the cause the energy spike is a Wraith generator.

programme.title: Justice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E10, Everyone is shocked when a member of the crew is found dead from a gunshot wound. While it appears to be suicide, the gun is nowhere to be founduntil it shows up in Col. Youngs (Louis Ferreira) quarters and he becomes the number one suspect.

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E11, An alien vessel appears in Destinys path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isnt the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E12, Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ships hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Friends In Deed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E12, Dr. Monahan's behavior unnerves Kelly as he checks out her injured shoulder. Valerie warns Noah that he may be in over his head trying to manage the After Dark.

programme.title: Comic Relief
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E13, Dr. Monahan makes inappropriate advances toward Kelly. David and Valerie proceed with their plan to make their exes jealous. Steve performs at the After Dark's comedy showcase.

programme.title: Santa Knows
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E14, Kelly considers filing sexual harassment charges against Monahan, but does not want to interfere with a fundraiser for the clinic. Val and David realize how much they mean to each other.

programme.title: Ready Or Not
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E15, Dr. Monahan forces Kelly out of the clinic. Brandon and Steve hire a new assistant, Janet Sosna; and bring David aboard as a music reviewer. Valerie cuts a deal with a bookie operating at the After Dark.

programme.title: Illegal Tender
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E16, David tries to make amends after his first music review gets the artist fired; Valerie ignores Noah's decree to halt the sports betting at the club.

programme.title: Crimes & Misdemeanors
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E19, Despite meeting Noah, Donna's hospitalized grandmother says Donna's fated mate is David, who moves out of Valerie's room; Kelly alerts Brandon to a potential story about an ex-con; Steve coaxes Brandon into a double date.

programme.title: Law & Disorder
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E22, Noah's civil trial begins. His attorney portrays Valerie as a golddigging tramp, and uses the gang's testimony to place Noah in a favorable light. David's record company experiences a shake-up.

programme.title: Aunt Bea's Pickles
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E25, During Valerie's surprise birthday party, Abby announces that she and Bill are engaged. Brandon receives a job offer from a major newspaper but faces a dilemma when he learns he is only being hired as a replacement for striking reporters.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E27, Image seems to be everything at the gang's five-year high-school reunion, where Valerie creates new personas for herself and David, while Andrea Zuckerman tries to hang on to her old one.

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E29, Kelly finds it impossible to trust Brandon as he works late every night for several weeks. Noah entertains Gwyneth, a longtime friend. David becomes extremely jumpy after being robbed at an ATM.

programme.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E30, Brandon and Kelly try to help a Bosnian refugee find his wife; Donna puts on a fashion show; Gwyneth takes a page from Valerie's book after admitting feelings for Noah; Steve learns Sarah is married.

programme.title: Budget Cuts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E02, After learning that the clinic may lose funding, Kelly asks Brandon to write a story to generate publicity. David believes that Valerie killed her father in self-defense and should move on.

programme.title: Dealer's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E03, Abby announces that she and Carl are planning to elope in Las Vegas, and asks Val to be her maid of honor. Kelly begs Val to let her tag along on the trip because she believes that Brandon is seeing someone else.

programme.title: Don't Ask, Don't Tell
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E04, Carl decides to annul his marriage to Abby because he believes that he has a future with Valerie. Kelly notices that a store is for lease and decides that she and Donna should open a boutique.

programme.title: Brandon Leaves
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E05, Brandon announces that he has accepted a job with the Washington bureau of the New York Chronicle. Kelly and Donna prepare to open their store, Now Wear This. Valerie seeks legal advice from Matt.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E06, Kelly decides to help Leah and her daughter skip town and assume a new identity. Valerie elects to throw a massive rave as a farewell party before turning herself in to the police.

programme.title: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E07, As Kelly and Valerie pack Brandon's belongings for shipment, Kelly discovers a letter in which Val advised Brandon not to marry her. She turns everyone against Val and gets them to boycott her Thanksgiving gathering.

programme.title: Windswept
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E04, At the annual Baywatch Lifeguard Bachelor Auction, Mitch is "bought" for $5,000 by a wealthy socialite. The relationship gets complicated when they get stranded on an island and their social status is reversed. Cody joins a local roller hockey team.

programme.title: Scorcher
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E05, LA is in the throes of a severe heat wave! Hundreds of thousands of people head to the beach. Lifeguarding gets more chaotic for the team when the Secret Service shows up to inform them that the President is going to go jogging on the beach.

programme.title: Beachblast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E06, To sponsor the Special Olympics at the beach, Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast:" a live televised tournament. After being evicted from his apartment, Cody moves in with CJ and Caroline, creating a surplus of sexual tension.

programme.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E07, CJ's mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town seeking CJ's help to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend. When CJ and her mom are held hostage on a remote beach, it is up to Mitch and Cody to rescue them.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E08, Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E09, Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E10, After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E11, Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.

programme.title: Bachlor of the Month
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E12, Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Chance of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E13, Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Talk Show
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E14, Mitch gets his 15 minutes of fame when he rescues Jay Leno from choking, and a female talk show host from drowning. Caroline and CJ adopt a stray dog swimming in the ocean that mystically reminds them of Stephanie.

programme.title: Life Guardian
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E15, After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E16, Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: Rendezvous
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E17, When a young couples romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him except CJ.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E18, While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E19, Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbors newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E20, CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.
